attribute.name: parent
attribute.tooltip: Returns the parent node in the AST, or undefined if it is the root node

attribute.name: code
attribute.tooltip: String with the code represented by this node

attribute.name: children
attribute.tooltip: Returns an array with the children of the node

attribute.name: descendants
attribute.tooltip: Returns an array with the descendants of the node

attribute.name: scopeNodes
attribute.tooltip: the nodes of the scope of the current join point. If this node has a body (e.g., loop, function) corresponds to the children of the body. Otherwise, returns an empty array
